# isAutoFocusEnabled

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that determines whether the device camera uses fixed focus or autofocus behavior.

## Declaration

```swift
var isAutoFocusEnabled: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

Autofocus is enabled by default.
title: isAutoFocusEnabled
